name: Mest' boksjora. Moskovskij kriminalitet
storyline: The famous boxer is falsely accused of a murder he did not commit. The boxer goes to jail, where he will have to defend his honor in a fight with a criminal authority. The boxer manages to escape from prison and escape to freedom. Now only he can find the real killers and restore justice, simultaneously beating passers-by, trolleybus controllers, truckers and Moscow prostitutes of all stripes.
